title: Rousher
author: Rousher
content: Hey guys, I'm trying to setup an electrum wallet. Howver, I've run into difficulties with downloading the signatures for the windows installer. Cloudflare says the connection timed out, so is the page down or am I just missing something on my end?

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Quote from: Rousher on July 31, 2023, 08:53:52 PMHey guys, I'm trying to setup an electrum wallet. Howver, I've run into difficulties with downloading the signatures for the windows installer. Cloudflare says the connection timed out, so is the page down or am I just missing something on my end?You mean this?https://download.electrum.org/4.4.5/electrum-4.4.5-setup.exe.ascIt works for me. Without error. Try using a different browser.

comments.author: Rousher
comments.body: Quote from: decodx on July 31, 2023, 09:18:09 PMQuote from: Rousher on July 31, 2023, 08:53:52 PMHey guys, I'm trying to setup an electrum wallet. Howver, I've run into difficulties with downloading the signatures for the windows installer. Cloudflare says the connection timed out, so is the page down or am I just missing something on my end?You mean this?https[Suspicious link removed].ascIt works for me. Without error. Try using a different browser.Thanks for your help! Seems like it was an ISP issue, just needed to turn on a VPN.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Quote from: Rousher on July 31, 2023, 09:35:51 PMThanks for your help! Seems like it was an ISP issue, just needed to turn on a VPN.No you don't need to use VPN it's a server issue related to the website not your ISP. You can just wait I'm sure it would work later without using VPN.You can also try to download it on Incognito mode but if the issue still there I suggest try to change your PC DNS to cloudflare DNS 1.1.1.1 and 1.0.0.1
